hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#list of branches, sort from older to newer declare -a SFB_branches=("3.0.1" "3.0.0_450HD" "3.0.2") #if the current gerrit branch is the last on the list then exit: #because there is no need to cherry pick it to anywhere if [ "${SFB_branches[${#SFB_branches[@]}-1]}" == "${GERRIT_BRANCH}" ]; then exit 0; fi
#some init params url="https://gerrit/a/changes/?q=" vote=1 declare -a missingBranches
#loop the branch list for i in "${!SFB_branches[@]}"; do #find the gerrit branch in list if [[ "${SFB_branches[$i]}" = "${GERRIT_BRANCH}" ]]; then echo "*** SFB_branches[$i] is THE current branch ***" index=${i}; continue; fi #if gerrit branch was already found, then check if current branch has this change-ID if [[ $index ]]; then exist=$(curl -k -s --digest -u jenkins:$curl_pass $url$GERRIT_CHANGE_ID |grep -c "\"branch\": \"${SFB_branches[$i]}\"" || true); if [[ "$exist" = "0" ]]; then echo "*** Change-ID was not found in branch ${SFB_branches[$i]} ***" vote=-1; missingBranches+=("${SFB_branches[$i]}") else echo "*** Change-ID does exist in branch ${SFB_branches[$i]} ***" fi fi done
echo "*** check was done. need to vote $vote to gerrit ***" echo "*** these are the branched without cherry-pick: ${missingBranches[@]} ***"
############################# #reply vote to gerrit label Cherry-Pick + message if [[ "$vote" = "-1" ]]; then ssh -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit gerrit review --project IPP/SFB --message "'missing cherry-pick to branch: ${missingBranches[@]}'" --label Cherry-Pick=-1 $GERRIT_PATCHSET_REVISION else ssh -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit gerrit review --project IPP/SFB --message "'No missing cherry-pick'" --label Cherry-Pick=1 $GERRIT_PATCHSET_REVISION fi
